name: inventory-management-system
description: Modern inventory management system with microservices architecture

scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:vendor"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:auth && npm run build:inventory && npm run build:notification && npm run build:vendor
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm install && cd ../inventory-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../vendor-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm test && cd ../inventory-service && npm test && cd ../notification-service && npm test && cd ../vendor-service && npm test

author: Inventory Management System Team
